document.full_text: the red bulls scored as many goals in the first 15 minutes saturday night as they had in their first four games, then added another long-awaited one from thierry henry in the final minutes to beat the san jose earthquakes, 3-0.
document.title: the red bulls find their scoring touch
lines_and_colors: the red bulls scored as many goals in the first 15 minutes saturday night as they had in their first four games, then added another long-awaited one from thierry henry in the final minutes to beat the san jose earthquakes, 3-0.
